metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Lady With A Fan has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Lady With A Fan has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Major,  and G Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
